Class Server.SocketConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jgrapes.net.Server.SocketConnection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Connection, DataConnection, NioHandler
    Enclosing class:
    Server

    public class Server.SocketConnection
extends java.lang.Object
implements NioHandler, DataConnection
    The internal representation of a connected client.
    Author:
    Michael N. Lipp

      • getResponsePipeline

        public EventPipeline getResponsePipeline()
        Description copied from interface: Connection
        Gets an EventPipeline that can be used for events going back to the initiator on this connection. Consistently using this event pipeline for response events ensures that the events are written in proper sequence.
        Specified by:
        getResponsePipeline in interface Connection

      • registrationComplete

                          throws java.lang.InterruptedException,
                                 java.io.IOException

        Parameters:
        event - the completed event
        Throws:

        java.io.IOException

      • getChannel

        public Channel getChannel()
        Description copied from interface: Connection
        Returns A channel that can be used to fire connection related events. This is usually the initiator component's channel. Providing this channel as part of the connection simplifies the implementation of responder components as they don't need any other means to find out where to send response events to. Of course, if the initiator component has a well known channel, this well known channel may be used directly as well.
        Specified by:
        getChannel in interface Connection
        Returns:
        the channel
